title: Hardin-Simmons Presidential Search Committee Announced (Hardin-Simmons University)
text: ( Source : Hardin-Simmons University ) Members of Hardin-Simmons University's newly-formed Presidential Search Committee were announced in a recent email addressed to HSU faculty and staff from Mr. Jerry D. Sawyer , Chair of HSU's Board of
